name: Find These Hidden School Supplies! Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Unfortunately, John and Mark erred when they said that school supplies are inexpensive.
questions.explanation:
marker.

	...MARK ERred when.... Sets of markers for graphic artists include many shades of each color, including gray. Most markers for kids are nontoxic and impermanent.

questions.text: My school dictionary open, "cillium" was the first word I saw--it can mean "eyelash"!
questions.explanation:
pencil.

	...oPEN, "CILlium".... My favorite pencils are "Extra Soft" ones made by a company called Dixon Ticonderoga. They are yellow pencils with metallic green trim and nice pink erasers on the ends.

questions.text: My papa's teacher used to pay for many of her students' school supplies.
questions.explanation:
paste.

	...paPA'S TEacher.... They used to call it "library paste." I like the way it smells. Don't eat it, though!

questions.text: "It's a school rule," Robyn said, "to bring your own supplies."
questions.explanation:
ruler.

	...a school RULE," Robyn said.... You can buy transparent plastic rulers in many different colors. Some have stencils cut in them to help you draw perfect circles, squares, and triangles.

questions.text: Use your school art supplies to cut a perfect circle.
questions.explanation:
tape.

	...cuT A PErfect circle.... There's transparent tape, masking tape, electrician's tape, and many other kinds. I love tape--don't know why.

questions.text: His friends tap Leroy's shoulder and ask whether he remembered to bring his school supplies.
questions.explanation:
stapler.

	...friendS TAP LERoy's shoulder.... Usually, schools supply the staplers--students don't have to purchase them themselves. When stapling papers together, keep your fingers well out of the way!

questions.text: In this modern era, servants don't often purchase their employers' kids' school supplies--but maybe they do in movie stars' families.
questions.explanation:
eraser.

	In this modern ERA, SERvants.... Erasers come in all shapes and colors, but I still prefer the good old rectangular pink ones with slanted ends. The erasers at the ends of pencils always seem to be used up before the pencil lead.

questions.text: Our smart papa persuaded us to buy our school supplies early this year.
questions.explanation:
paper.

	...paPA PERsuaded us.... Lined paper is usually white with horizontal blue lines and a red vertical line on the left side. Sometimes there's a red vertical line on the right side, too. Notebook paper has three holes along the left margin so you can put the paper in a three-ring binder. Funtrivia Editor spanishliz offers even more info on this topic: "While in Canada and the US [binder paper] normally has 3 holes, for a three ring binder, in England it has only 2 holes and in Spain it comes with 4 holes! Never bought a binder in England, but have seen them in Spain with either 2 or 4 rings.The 4-hole paper will fit in either." Thanks, Liz!

questions.text: Her friends Shelby, Taylor, and Deb all point Penny in the right direction, telling her to buy her school supplies on time this year.
questions.explanation:
ballpoint pen.

	...Taylor, and DeB ALL POINT PENny.... Don't let this happen to you: once in junior high school I was sucking on my ballpoint pen. Suddenly my mouth was filled with dark blue ink! How embarrassing--and possibly toxic!

questions.text: Mom said, "Please don't panic, Ray. On Saturday we'll buy your school supplies."
questions.explanation:
crayon & crayons.

	...don't paniC, RAY. ON Saturday.... I love the metallic-colored crayons: gold, silver, and copper. I also like the built-in sharpener that some crayon boxes have. This quiz is dedicated to Anaztazia Nina, my newest niece.
